feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application (SWR calculator) with concrete inputs, Monte Carlo/scenario simulations, and meaningful outputs (annual income, survival rate, final balance). The student shows both conceptual design (Discover) and executed implementation (Implement) with multiple example runs, meeting the PASS standard.
- Integrate AI: The student demonstrates substantive AI integration across multiple DRIVER stages: ideation and modeling with Gemini, prompt engineering, and implementation in Google AI Studio, plus AI-driven validation scenarios. This goes beyond superficial mention and shows the AI added concrete design and implementation value, satisfying PASS.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I decided to make a safe withdrawal safe withdrawal rate calculator or SWR um, which is used to tell a retiree or a person who's recently retired how much they can spend in a certain year um, for every year until the end of their life."
"to implement AI into this app... I developed the app using Google AI Studio."
"For example the stagflation nightmare um an initial portfolio of 750,000... So we run the simulation... we survive all 30 years. We've withdrawn in total 1.4 million."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover/Define — identified the financial problem (SWR for retirees) and set goals; Implement — built the app in Google AI Studio and integrated simulations; Reflect/Represent — ran multiple scenario simulations and interpreted outputs (ledger, survival, final balance), showing iterative DRIVER loops.
criteria.reasoning: The submission describes and demonstrates a working financial application (SWR calculator) with concrete inputs, Monte Carlo/scenario simulations, and meaningful outputs (annual income, survival rate, final balance). The student shows both conceptual design (Discover) and executed implementation (Implement) with multiple example runs, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "to implement AI into this app... I developed the app using Google AI Studio."
"this is the final outcome of we're running through two loops of the driver framework to de develop this app."
"I use Google Gemini to help come up with the idea and using that information generate a prompt to input it into Google AI Studio."
criteria.reasoning: The student demonstrates substantive AI integration across multiple DRIVER stages: ideation and modeling with Gemini, prompt engineering, and implementation in Google AI Studio, plus AI-driven validation scenarios. This goes beyond superficial mention and shows the AI added concrete design and implementation value, satisfying PASS.
